c74object.name: j.mutesolo~
c74object.digest: Mute and solo individual audio channels
c74object.description: j.mutesolo~ enables muting or soloing of individual signals in a multi-channel audio stream.

inlet.description: The number of inlets and outlets for j.mutesolo~ is determined by the number of channels specified as an argument to the object.

outlet.description: The processed signal. Depending on current channel mute and solo settings the input signal will be passed through or muted (zeroed).
A getChannelMute message returns current mute settings for all channels as a list. A getChannelSolo message returns current solo settings for all channels as a list.

objarg.name: number-of-channels
objarg.description: The number of channels of the signal to process. This determines the number of inlets and outlets of the object.

method.name: clear
method.digest: Clear current mute and solo settings.
method.description: Resets the object to its default settings where none of the channels are muted or soloed.

method.name: getChannelMute
method.description: A getChannelMute message returns current mute settings for all channels as a list at the dumpout outlet.

method.name: getChannelSolo
method.description: A getChannelSolo message returns current solo settings for all channels as a list at the dumpout outlet.

method.name: setChannelMute
method.digest: Set the mute status for one channel
method.description: A setChannelMute message followed by an integer specifying the channel (counting from 0) and a mute-value mutes this channel if the value is non-zero, and un-mutes it if the value is zero. If one or more channels are soloed, it overrides any current settings for channel mute.

method.name: setChannelSolo
method.digest: Set the solo status for one channel
method.description: A setChannelSolo message followed by an integer specifying the channel (counting from 0) and a solo-value soloes this channel if the value is non-zero, while it is not soloed if the value is zero. If one or more channels are soloed, it overrides any current settings for channel mute.

method.name: signal
method.description: Each inlet can be muted or soloed. When no channels are muted or soloed, all signals are passed through un-affected.

attribute.name: bypass
attribute.description: When non-zero, signal processing in this object is bypassed.

attribute.name: interpolate
attribute.description: When non-zero, gain levels for each channel is interpolated to new values over one sample vector if channel mute or solo settings are changed.

attribute.name: mute
attribute.description: When non-zero, signal processing in all of this object is muted.
